data.name: API The Docs Portland 2020
data.description: On the 1st of May 2020 API The Docs is returning to the USA with a full-day single-track event in Portland (OR) to share and discuss the latest best practices, strategies and new trends relevant to API documentation and developer portals.

relatedRecords.name: Global Azure Atlanta 2020
relatedRecords.description: The annual Global Azure (formerly Global Azure Bootcamp) event will return to the greater metro-Atlanta area for the 6th year! The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthus…

relatedRecords.name: IT Pro Camp 2020
relatedRecords.description: Putting on an event of this size takes a lot of people. To keep the costs down, we need generous people like you to volunteer your time. Sign up using the button below, As a Reward, all voluteers will be able to take the certification testing on Friday evening before the event. Now how cool is that…

relatedRecords.name: Sensu Summit 2019
relatedRecords.description: Sensu Summit 2019 is happening September 9-10 in Portland, OR. Join us for two days of technical talks, workshops, and all the #monitoringlove.
